person.name: Rafael E. Pino
person.description: Elder Rafael E. Pino was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 5, 2008, at age 52. At the time of his call, he had been serving as a member of the Fourth Quorum of the Seventy in the South America North Area. He has served as a counselor in the South America North Area, counselor in the South America Northwest Area Presidency, and is currently serving as a president in the South America Northwest Area.
